## DataLoaderAbstractComponent class

Abstract class that represents any data loader component

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class DataLoaderAbstractComponent<TOptions extends DataLoaderOptions, TOrdering, TResult> implements DataLoader<TResult>, GridPluginGeneric<TOptions>, OnDestroy 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(pluginElement, gridPlugins)](./grid.dataloaderabstractcomponent._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>DataLoaderAbstractComponent</code> class |
